content:
It appears that the poem touches on the theme of value investing, with value stocks performing well due to improved economic conditions and the "real economy smelling like roses." The poem also mentions the importance of considering discounted cash flows when evaluating stocks. Additionally, the poem mentions the potential for rising interest rates and inflation, which could impact the performance of certain investments.

It's worth noting that it is always important to do your own research and due diligence before making any investment decisions. It is never a good idea to base investment decisions solely on a poem or any other single source of information. It is always important to consider your own financial goals and risk tolerance, and to seek professional financial advice if you are uncertain about any aspect of your investment strategy.
